item.title: Brightinstar Launches MF 35mm F1.4 Full-Frame Manual Lens, Priced from USD 99.86
item.description: Lens manufacturer Brightinstar has released an affordable, full-frame 35mm F1.4 manual focus lens. With a retro metal design and an introductory price of RMB 699 (~USD 99.86), it targets photography enthusiasts seeking a budget-friendly prime lens.

item.title: Volcano Engine Named Exclusive AI Cloud Partner for the 2026 Spring Festival Gala
item.description: ByteDance’s Volcano Engine has been appointed the exclusive AI cloud partner for the 2026 CCTV Spring Festival Gala. It will use its multimodal AI and cloud tech to support program production and interactivity for the massive live event.

item.title: Sharge Secures Nearly USD 14.29 million in Series A+ Funding to Accelerate AI Glasses Rollout
item.description: Consumer tech company Sharge has raised nearly RMB 100 million (~USD 14.29M) to scale production of its new AI glasses. The product, launching soon, integrates a memory engine for personal data and targets shipments of over 100,000 units in its first year.

item.title: Shanghai Jiao Tong University and Huawei Unveil “Zhiyuan-1,” a National Benchmark for University AI Computing [图片]
item.description: Shanghai Jiao Tong University and Huawei have launched “Zhiyuan-1,” a massive AI computing platform for academic research. With 633 PFLOPS of power, it supports large model training and complex projects like deep-sea genomics and medical diagnostics.

item.title: AI² Robotics Launches “ZhiCube,” the World’s First Modular Embodied AI Service Space
item.description: AI² Robotics has launched “ZhiCube,” a modular service space powered by its humanoid robots. The company plans to deploy 1,000 units across China within three years as part of its intelligent urban infrastructure strategy.
